#summary How to download reinCRUD
#labels Phase-Deploy,Featured

= Download =

You can download the reincrud release from our maven2 repository at:

{{{
<repository>
   <id>acoveo</id>
   <url>http://www.acoveo.com/maven2/repo</url>
</repository>
}}}

or from the [http://www.vaadin.com vaadin] [http://vaadin.com/directory#addon/reincrud addon site] repository:

{{{
<repository>
   <id>vaadin-addons</id>
   <url>http://maven.vaadin.com/vaadin-addons</url>
</repository>
}}}
